title: Switchboard replacement
fullText:
In New Zealand, when a switchboard is replaced, any neutral-earth link shall be removed. Also, the following shall be installed if not already in place:
(a) Overcurrent protection for each external supply, in accordance with Clause 4.5.3.1; and
(b) RCD protection for all final subcircuits, in accordance with Clause 4.5.4.
